amendment.description: To authorize appropriate action if the negotiations with the People's Republic of China regarding China's undervalued currency are not successful.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 309 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 67. Record Vote Number: 86.

Amendment SA 309 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S3243, S3249-3253; text: CR S3243) To authorize appropriate action if the negotiations with the People's Republic of China regarding China's undervalued currency are not successful.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 309 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 309 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 67. Record Vote Number: 86.
